description.ko: 지구의 층을 정교하게 관찰하며, 암석과 광물의 질감을 통해 시간과 압력의 이야기를 들려줍니다.
description.en: A detailed look at the layers of the earth, focusing on the textures of rock and mineral to tell a story of time and pressure.

prompt: A macro-topographic cross-section of an ancient tectonic fault line. Jagged layers of #8B4513 obsidian and #D2691E red clay intersect with #F4A460 crystalline quartz veins glowing with internal heat. Side lighting from the golden hour creates deep shadows across the rough #2F4F4F bedrock textures. 8k resolution, hyper-realistic geological sediment, showing the narrative of a land carved by eons of geological pressure and mineral evolution.
